column3: This change seems reasonable, but I don't think LockAnnotation is a good name for this class if it can potentially assert and abort the program. Would suggest adding a scripted diff to rename LockAnnotation to `LockAssert` or something similar.
@ryanofsky Thanks for the quick review! I've now added a `scripted-diff` which renames `LockAnnotation` to `LockAssertion`. Please re-review :-)
Please update OP with the rename to `LockAssertion`.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
